# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)
- Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment without fuel
- Make sure to provide fuel for burner equipment before using them.
### Errors when using inserter without source items
- Ensure the inserter has source items to work with.
### Errors when using furnace without ingredients
- Make sure the furnace has the necessary ingredients to function.
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
- Connect the steam engine to a power network to use it.
### Errors when using pipe group without fluid
- Ensure the pipe group has fluid to transport.
### Errors when using electricity group without connection to electric network
- Connect the electricity group to an electric network to use it.
### Errors when using belt group without items
- Ensure the belt group has items to transport.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked in the provided execution logs.
